## Exploración y descripción

```{r}
terr <- read.csv2("terrorismo.csv")
```


```{r}
barplot(t(as.matrix(terr[,c(4,5)])), beside = TRUE)
```

```{r}
barplot(t(as.matrix(terr[,c(2,3)])), beside = TRUE)
```


```{r}
barplot(t(as.matrix(terr[,2:4])), beside = TRUE)
```


```{r}
require(ggplot2)
g1 <- ggplot(terr, aes(Año, vict_atent))
g1 + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
g1 <- ggplot(terr, aes(Año, vict_suicid))
g1 + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
g1 <- ggplot(terr, aes(Año, num_atent))
g1 + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
g1 <- ggplot(terr, aes(Año, num_suicid))
g1 + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```

```{r}
terr$vict_x_atent <- with(terr, vict_atent/num_atent * 100)
terr$vict_x_suicid <- with(terr, vict_suicid/num_suicid * 100)

require(tidyr)
require(dplyr)
terr2 <- terr %>% 
         select(Año, vict_x_atent, vict_x_suicid) %>% 
         gather(tipo, indice, c(vict_x_atent, vict_x_suicid))
```

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
g1 <- ggplot(terr2, aes(Año, indice, col = tipo))
g1 + geom_line()

g1 <- ggplot(terr2, aes(Año, indice, col = tipo))
g1 + geom_line(size = 1.5) +
     ggtitle("Porcentaje de víctimas por tipo de atentado") +
     scale_x_continuous(breaks = unique(terr2$Año)) +
     scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,26,2)) +
     ylab("Porcentaje (%)") +
     theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
